17 int main(int argc, char** argv){
18  if(argc<2){
19  pcl::console::print_error("Syntax is: %s <pcd-file> \n"
20  " --- supervoxel parameters ---\n"
21  "-NT disables the single cloud transform \n"
22  "-v <voxel_resolution>\n-s <seed resolution>\n"
23  "-c <color weight> \n-z <spatial weight> \n"
24  "-n <normal weight> \n"
25  "--- LCCP parameters ---\n"
26  "-sc disable sanity criterion\n"
27  "-ct concavity tolerance\n"
28  "-st smoothness threshold\n"
29  "-ec enable extended criterion\n"
30  "-min_segment min segment size\n"
31  " --- other parameters ---\n"
32  "-zmin minimum distance orthogonal to table plane\n"
33  "-zmax maximum distance orthogonal to table plane\n"
34  "-th_points amounts of points to consider as cluster\n"
35  "\n", argv[0]);
36  return(1);
37  }
38 
39  //parameters for the algorithm
40  supervoxel_parameters param;
41  //parsing inputs
42  param.disable_transform = pcl::console::find_switch(argc, argv, "-NT");
43  pcl::console::parse(argc, argv, "-v", param.voxel_resolution);
44  pcl::console::parse(argc, argv, "-s", param.seed_resolution);
45  pcl::console::parse(argc, argv, "-c", param.color_importance);
46  pcl::console::parse(argc, argv, "-z", param.spatial_importance);
47  pcl::console::parse(argc, argv, "-n", param.normal_importance);
48  pcl::console::parse(argc, argv, "-ct", param.concavity_tolerance_threshold);
49  pcl::console::parse(argc, argv, "-st", param.smoothness_threshold);
50  pcl::console::parse(argc, argv, "-min_segment", param.min_segment_size);
51  pcl::console::parse(argc, argv, "-zmin", param.zmin);
52  pcl::console::parse(argc, argv, "-zmax", param.zmax);
53  pcl::console::parse(argc, argv, "-th_points", param.th_points);
54  param.use_extended_convexity = pcl::console::find_switch(argc, argv, "-ec");
55  param.use_sanity_criterion = pcl::console::find_switch(argc, argv, "-sc");
56 
57  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>);
58  pcl::console::print_highlight("Loading point cloud...\n");
59  if(pcl::io::loadPCDFile<pcl::PointXYZRGBA> (argv[1], *cloud)){
60  pcl::console::print_error("Error loading cloud file!\n");
61  return(1);
62  }
63 
64  lccp_segmentation seg;
65  std::vector<Object> seg_objs;
66  seg.init(*cloud, param);
67  seg.print_parameters();
68  seg.segment();
69  seg_objs = seg.get_segmented_objects();
70  std::cout<<"\n Detected "<<seg_objs.size()<<" Objects.\n\n";
71 
72  //Visualizer
73  pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer::Ptr viewer(new pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer
74  ("3D Viewer"));
75  viewer->setBackgroundColor(0,0,0);
76  viewer->registerKeyboardCallback(keyboardEventOccured,(void*)&viewer);
77 
78  seg.show_table_plane(viewer);
79  seg.show_segmented_objects(viewer);
80  //bool show_adjacency_map = true;
81  //bool show_super_voxel_normals = false;
82  //seg.show_super_voxels(viewer, show_adjacency_map, show_super_voxel_normals);
83 
84  std::cout<<"Press 'n' to close\n";
85  while(!viewer->wasStopped() && !pressed)
86  viewer->spinOnce(100);
87 
88  seg.clean_viewer(viewer);
89 
90 
91 
92  return 0;
93 }

lccp_segmentation
Class to detect table top objects in a cluttered scene segmenting the point cloud. Algorithm is based on http://docs.pointclouds.org/trunk/classpcl_1_1_l_c_c_p_segmentation.html.
